title: Microsoft Surface Pro X and Pro 7 hands-on
description: Microsoft unveiled two Surface Pro devices this year. The Surface Pro 7, a successor to the regular Surface Pro line, and the new Surface Pro X. It looks a lot like the Surface Pro 7 from a distance, but it has a bigger 13-inch display inside a 12-inch chassis thats thinner and lighter than the Surface Pro were used to. It also has a new ARM-based Surface SQ1 processor inside, a chip that has been co-engineered between Microsoft and Qualcomm.
